name: verifying the Create Api is able to create a new job
description: verifying the Create Api is able to create a new job
descriptionHtml: verifying the Create Api is able to create a new job

testStage.description: verifying the Create Api is able to create a new job

steps.name: Creating Inwarrenty Job with Create Job API
Setting up BaseURI, ContentType as Application/JSON and attaching SensitiveDataFilter for a role and attaching Payload
Getting Property Value from config file
Getting the Auth token for the role

parameters.name: payload
parameters.value: CreateJobPayload[mst_service_location_id=1, mst_platform_id=2, mst_warrenty_status_id=1, mst_oem_id=1, customer=Customer[first_name=Ahi, last_name=Rana, mobile_number=9874563215, mobile_number_alt=8956231452, email_id=ahi@gmail.com, email_id_alt=rana@gmail.com], customer_address=CustomerAddress[flat_number=789, apartment_name=Sai parivar, street_name=M N Nmbiyar, landmark=good Area, area=Madurai, pincode=987456, country=India, state=TamilNadu], customer_product=CustomerProduct[dop=2026-02-10T05:14:38.621189928Z, serial_number=78754118306217, imei1=78754118306217, imei2=78754118306217, popurl=2026-02-10T05:14:38.621295426Z, product_id=1, mst_model_id=1], problems=[Problems[id=10, remark=Slow]]]
